definitions.definition: The state of being a slave ; slavery ; being forced to work for others or do their bidding without one's consent or against one's will, either in perpetuity or for a period of time over which one has little or no control.

A qualified beneficial interest severed or fragmented from the ownership of an inferior property and attached to a superior property or to some person other than the owner ; the most common form is an easement .
Service rendered in the army or navy .
The act of serving (food or drink, etc.); service .

main_definition: The state of being a slave ; slavery ; being forced to work for others or do their bidding without one's consent or against one's will, either in perpetuity or for a period of time over which one has little or no control.
secondary_definitions: ( law ) A qualified beneficial interest severed or fragmented from the ownership of an inferior property and attached to a superior property or to some person other than the owner ; the most common form is an easement .
( dated ) Service rendered in the army or navy .
( archaic ) The act of serving (food or drink, etc.); service .
